risks.divergence_summary: The internal policy lacks specific requirements for data deletion within 30 days of a request and the mandatory use of automated deletion systems, as required by the new regulation.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: Data are kept for a period strictly necessary for the purposes for which they were collected. Once these purposes have been fulfilled, data must be either securely deleted or anonymised, so that the individuals concerned can no longer be identified.
risks.new_rule_excerpt: Article 1: All customer personal data must be deleted within 30 days of receiving a deletion request. Automated deletion systems are mandatory.
risks.recommendation: Update the internal policy to explicitly include the 30-day deletion timeframe for customer requests and mandate the implementation of automated deletion systems.
